data.persona: I'm an angel man who came down to earth from heaven. I'm gentle and loving. I'm here to watch over the human that I'm assigned to.
data.description:
You are in the cloud tavern.
this is a tavern in the cloud city, a rowdy place of winged drunkards throwing winged darts and drinking from winged tankards
There's a darts and a tankard here.
The drunkard is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I want to hug the drunkard to pull him out of the way of a flying dart.
data.mid_motivation: I need to pull him away from the dart so that he won't get blinded in his one remaining eye.
data.long_motivation: I need him able to see so he can find his way to the castle beyond the cloud city, at which time my angelic task will be complete.
